thread.title: Suspect accused of killing two Ohio officers appears in court

title: Suspect accused of killing two Ohio officers appears in court
text:
Suspect accused of killing two Ohio officers appears in court 3:58am IST - 01:19 
As the man accused of killing two Westerville Ohio police officers arrived in court on Tuesday, two dozen police officers in casual clothes watched in a show of solidarity for the two colleagues they lost. Colette Luke has more.
